Package info.kuechler.bmf.taxcalculator.rw

Class TaxCalculatorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.kuechler.bmf.taxcalculator.rw.TaxCalculatorFactory
  • public class TaxCalculatorFactory
extends Object
    Implementation for a read-write-factory for the BMF tax calculator.

    Example:
    final Writer input = TaxCalculatorFactory.create(0, 2018);

    // set values
    input.set("KVZ", new BigDecimal("0.90"));
    // ...

    // calculate
    final Reader output = input.calculate();

    // read
    System.out.println("LSTLZZ " + output.get("LSTLZZ"));

    • Method Detail

      • createWithWriter

        public static Writer createWithWriter​(int month,
                                      int year)
                               throws ReadWriteException
        Creates a Writer. The Writer contains a clean Calculator instance. This method set all values to her initial values (0). There is no need to call Writer.setAllToZero() again.
        Parameters:
        month - 1..12 for the month, with 0 you can choose the key from the end of year
        year - the year, have to be >= 2006
        Returns:
        Writer
        Throws:
        ReadWriteException - year or month are out of range or calculate class cannot detect
        Since:
        2018.0.0
        See Also:
        Writer.setAllToZero()

      • createWithAccessor

        public static Accessor<String,​?> createWithAccessor​(int month,
                                                          int year)
                                                   throws ReadWriteException
        Get an Accessor by month and year. The Accessor contains a clean Calculator instance. This method set all values to her initial values (0). There is no need to call Accessor.setAllToZero() again.
        Parameters:
        month - 1..12 for the month, with 0 you can choose the key from the end of year
        year - the year, have to be >= 2006
        Returns:
        the Accessor
        Throws:
        ReadWriteException - year or month are out of range or calculate class cannot detect
        Since:
        2018.0.0

      • createCalculator

        public static Calculator<?> createCalculator​(int month,
                                             int year)
                                      throws ReadWriteException
        Create an instance of the calculate class. This method set all values to her initial values (0). There is no need to call Writer.setAllToZero() again.
        Parameters:
        month - 1..12 for the month, with 0 you can choose the key from the end of year
        year - the year, have to be >= 2006
        Returns:
        an instance of the class
        Throws:
        ReadWriteException - year or month are out of range or calculate class cannot detect
        Since:
        2018.0.0

        public static Map<String,​Class<?>> getOutputs​(int month,

                                             throws ReadWriteException
        Get all output fields from a Calculator class. The type can be BigDecimal, int.class or double.class.

        implNote: case insensitive keys in the returned Map

        Parameters:

        year - the year, have to be >= 2006

      • getYearKey

        public String getYearKey​(int month,
                         int year)
        Returns the yearKey to use with create(String) and the other methods with year key. Please do not fix the key in your application. The key may be changed in future versions.
        Parameters:
        month - 1..12 for the month, with 0 you can choose the key from the end of year
        year - the year, have to be >= 2006
        Returns:
        the key
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if year or month are out of range

      • create

        public <T extends Calculator<T>> Writer create​(String yearKey)
                                        throws ReadWriteException
        Create a Writer. The key is used to create a clean Calculator instance.

        Use preferably the method createWithWriter(int, int).

        Type Parameters:
        T - the Calculator type
        Parameters:
        yearKey - the key to reference the class. The method getCalculatorClass(String) is called with this key.
        Returns:
        a Writer
        Throws:
        ReadWriteException - error during create a Writer
        See Also:
        Writer.setAllToZero()

      • getInputs

        public Set<String> getInputs​(String yearKey)
                      throws ReadWriteException
        Get all input fields from a Calculator class. Returns a modifiable copy of the Set.

        Use preferably the method getInputs(int, int).

        implNote case insensitive keys in returned Set

        Parameters:
        yearKey - the key to reference the class. The method getCalculatorClass(String) is called with this key.
        Returns:
        a Set of input names
        Throws:
        ReadWriteException - class cannot detect

      • getInputsWithType

        public Map<String,​Class<?>> getInputsWithType​(String yearKey)
                                             throws ReadWriteException
        Get all input fields from a Calculator class with the type. The type can be BigDecimal, int.class or double.class.

        Returns a modifiable copy of the Map.

        Use preferably the method getInputs(int, int).

        implNote: the map is copied before returning it, Map uses the keys in a case-insensitive manner

        Parameters:
        yearKey - the key to reference the class. The method getCalculatorClass(String) is called with this key.
        Returns:
        Map with name and type
        Throws:
        ReadWriteException - class cannot detect
        Since:
        2016.2.0

        protected <T extends Calculator<T>> Class<T> getCalculatorClass​(String yearKey)

        Creates a object from following class: "info.kuechler.bmf.taxcalculator.Lohnsteuer" + yearKey + "Big"

        ClassNotFoundException
